properties.name: Adlers
properties.description: NULLAdlers Hatfield is an a la carte restaurant with a large menu offering a selection of breakfast and lunch options. From light meals, sandwiches and pancakes to burgers, steaks and more, Adlers is a great place to catch up with friends while enjoying good food.

properties.name: Vida e Caffé
properties.description: coffee shop, Akanyang next to the UP shop and Javett Hatfield Campus

properties.name: Piazza Foods
properties.description: If you’re looking for some decadent sweet treats on campus, then Piazza Foods is a must-visit. Their range of giant Chelsea buns and massive doughnuts are what sweet dreams are made of and are just the pick-me-up you need to smash those tight deadlines. Give them a visit and experience their fast service, good prices and sweet treats for yourself. Just follow the smell of the coffee and you’ll end up at the right place.

properties.name: Hatfield Campus Torpedo’s
properties.description: Every campus needs a proper takeaway shop that serves up delicious and simple on-the-go food options, and Hatfield Campus Torpedo’s is here to ensure you get the full experience. Dishing up some seriously good simple but hearty meals, such as their torpedo rolls, wraps, spuds, pitas, stir fry dishes, salads, and toasted rolls, at affordable rates makes Hatfield Campus Torpedo’s a campus favourite among students. Give them a visit and see for yourself what the fuss is all about.

properties.name: Big Al’s
properties.description: Big Al’s is here to satisfy those cravings with their range of burgers, both classic and gourmet, subs, salads and quick breakfast options. When you’re looking to get your fill of good food, Big Al’s is the perfect place to sit down and savour some of your favourite meals with your favourite people.

properties.name: Coffee Buzz
properties.description: Get your coffee fix with the good stuff without having to leave campus with Coffee Buzz. When you’re looking for a quick cup to take on the go, Coffee Buzz has got you covered with some of the best beans in Pretoria.

properties.name: Cozy Coffee
properties.description: We serve hot/cold beverages, snacks and ready-made meals.

properties.name: Cozy Coffee
properties.description: We serve hot/cold beverages, snacks and ready-made meals.

properties.name: Haloa Coffee Shop Hatfield Campus
properties.description: At Haloa Coffee Shop, they’re passionate about providing students a place to gather to share ideas, be inspired, or simply sit back and take a moment to relax during their busy day-to-day schedules while enjoying some good food and coffee. Taking time to create the perfect combination of ingredients for their coffees and food items, Haloa offers a selection of coffee shop pleasures, from breakfasts to wraps and, of course, some top-quality coffee to go along with it.

properties.name: Pure Café
properties.description: Offering a selection of breakfasts, toasted sandwiches, paninis, wraps, seasonal soups, loaded fires, and more, Pure Café is a true foodie’s paradise. This eatery doubles as a banquet hall during the day, serving up àla carte menu items and has a dedicated deli table for on-the-go options. So whether you’re looking to pick up a quick bite to eat or looking for a spot to soak up the sun and enjoy a leisurely lunch, Pure Café has you covered on all fronts.

properties.name: Steers Tukkies
properties.description: When you’re craving a chicken filled with flame-grilled flavour, there’s only one place to head to: Steers Tukkies. Feel like you never left home and stop by for a variety of sharing meals, lip-smacking burgers, mouth-watering ribs, flame-grilled chicken and, of course, the famous hand-cut chips and get your flavour on in no time. Don’t wait for Wacky Wednesday to tantalise those taste buds, even though it is also a good day too, and get your Steers fix without having to leave campus.

properties.name: Artisan Coffee Bar and Restaurant
properties.description: Artisan Coffee Bar and Restaurant situated at the Aula/Rautenbach Hall on Hatfield Campus. We serve staff and students with a budget-targeted menu featuring a wide variety of food and beverages catering for various tastes and customers with special diets e.g., vegetarian, vegan, keto and halal. We also make ready-made meals for those who do not have the time to cook in the evenings. Additionally, we cater for special events and departmental functions. Vouchers can also be purchased from us.
